nodes.text: The Kardue family was a Devaronian family famous because of their staunch support of the Devaronian Army: The three Kardue'sai'Malloc on the family tree were like their predecessor (though Mika has an unknown posture about that).
The Kardue family was also famous because the criminal Kardue'sai'Malloc the Third, the Butcher of Montellian Serat, was one of its members.
